quest.name: The Importance of Being Yes, Yes
journal:
Seigetsu the Enlightened seems agitated.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested supplies to the earnest Namazu.
objectives: Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to the earnest NamazuMine [Error] east of Mol IlohGather [Error] southeast of Mol IlohCatch [Error] in Hak Khaal.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Have you perchance encountered my errand boy? Grey, rotund fellow with a vacant gaze? No? I dispatched him with orders to procure additional happi materials some time ago, but have seen neither fin nor barbel of him since.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: You surely recognize that I cannot waste my talents tracking wayward lackeys─the festival would collapse into uncivilized chaos were I to neglect my intellectual endeavors for but a moment. If you are not otherwise engaged, can you search for him in my stead?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: His sojourn should have brought him to Mol Iloh, so you are likely to find him in the vicinity. If you discover him to have encountered complications, I trust you will ameliorate the situation.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Woe, woe is me! I have encountered complications. If only someone would ameliorate them...

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Oh! What a surprise to see you here, standing in silence mere ilms away. Yes, yes. Please never do it again.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: I was absorbed in thought, you see. I had promised to trade with the Mol for materials we can use in our festive happi, and brought some fincrafted fineries along for this purpose. But then, when I least expected it...

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: ...I was trampled by a charging dzo! It had dashed several malms by the time I regained my normal shape and the ability to walk. Yes, yes. I eventually discovered it devouring the last of my fineries.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: ...A flock of yol swooped down upon me! Luckily, I was able to liberate myself from their talons. Yes, yes. Less luckily, we were at least a malm in the air by then. By the time I regained solid ground and consciousness, my fineries were gone.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: ...I noticed several Buduga in pursuit! Hoping they would take my fineries instead of my life, I threw them behind me and ran. Yes, yes. Tossed them one and all.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: I have no choice but to remake what I have lost. But I am only one Namazu, and require many fineries for trade. Will you lend me a fin?

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Specifically, I find myself in need of more nails. Yes, yes. I have managed to collect the materials, so take whatever you need from this box.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Specifically, I find myself in need of more thick fabric. Yes, yes. I have managed to collect the materials, so take whatever you need from this box.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Specifically, I find myself in need of more lubricating oil. Yes, yes. I have managed to collect the ingredients, so take whatever you need from this box.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Specifically, I find myself in need of more steppe mica. Yes, yes. Can you bring me three fairly large chunks? I have had success finding deposits east of Mol Iloh.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Specifically, I find myself in need of more steppe safflower. Yes, yes. Can you harvest some? I have had success looking in the lush patches southeast of Mol Iloh.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Specifically, I find myself in need of another khaal crab. Yes, yes. Can you bring me one? I have had success fishing for them with a bit of salmon roe in Hak Khaal.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Please return to me when you are ready. I will craft the finest of fineries, yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Additional materials are there in the crate. I would assist you, but I recently got my whiskers caught in the lid. Yes, yes. I am taking a break from boxes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Additional materials are there in the crate. I would assist you, but I recently got my whiskers caught in the lid. Yes, yes. I am taking a break from boxes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Additional materials are there in the crate. I would assist you, but I recently got my whiskers caught in the lid. Yes, yes. I am taking a break from boxes.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You sift through the cornucopia of crafting materials and retrieve all you require for your work.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Be safe out there! Dangers abound. Yes, yes. I would know.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Be safe out there! Dangers abound. Yes, yes. I would know.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Be safe out there! Dangers abound. Yes, yes. I would know.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Did everything go to plan? Are all of your assorted fingers intact?

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Thank you, thank you! I will fashion these into fineries and deliver them to the Mol forthwith.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Can I trouble you to relay my tribulations to Seigetsu the Enlightened? He doubtless wonders about the delay.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03103
dialogue.text: Stay safe. And do not get killed!

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: I take it you return with information?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Hm. Precisely as I imagined.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: He is a hardworking fellow, but a veritable beacon for misfortune. I daresay his poor luck alone could bring about the Namazu's annihilation.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: As for you, I have no doubt that your efforts this day will have a profound effect on the outcome of our festival, and contribute to the enlightenment of Namazu one and all. Probably.
